body:
The code is here: https://github.com/golang/playground/tree/master/sandbox

On 22 February 2016 at 06:10, Minux Ma <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @adg, is the playground sandbox not using the nacl/amd64p32
> port anymore?
>
> I tested the program locally on linux with:
> GOARCH=amd64p32 GOOS=nacl go run 4VO52LiEVh.go
>
> and it works fine.
>
